attributes.action: Make a clear statement about the benefits of immigration to the UK
attributes.additional_details:
A petition calling on the UK Government to stop all immigration & close the UK borders until ISIS is defeated has been signed by 200K+ people & will be considered for debate.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107516

Immigration has huge benefits for the UK. Immigration, overseas tourism and international travel is vital to our economy. Stopping all travel in/out of the UK would be impossible, but unlike countries in the Schengen zone, the British borders are NOT open. Let sense prevail.
attributes.background: We call on the UK Government to make a clear unambiguous statement that immigration is of benefit to the UK, that immigration, overseas tourism and international travel is vital to our economy, and that – whilst the UK borders are not open – stopping all international travel is impossible.
